tool_description: This [unofficial] Ikea API is a great solution for developers looking for a comprehensive and up-to-date access to Ikea's products and search. An Ikea Scraper REST API solution.
name: Ikea API
title: Ikea API

api_list.name: Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Need more data from the same source or other sources? [Contact Us](https://tally.so/r/mVzr7j)

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
**format**: *parameterId=valueId,parameterId=valueId*
Can be obtained through the  **Search By Keyword Filters** endpoint,

api_list.name: Stores
api_list.description: Obtain a list of all stores in a specified country.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Obtain a list of all categories available in a specified country.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

api_list.name: Product
api_list.description: Get up-to-date Information for a specific product.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

required_parameters.name: productID
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Search By Keyword or Category** endpoints,

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: store
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Stores** endpoint,

api_list.name: Search By Keyword Filters
api_list.description: Complimentary to the "Search By Keyword" endpoint. Obtain a list of filters available based on a keyword.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

api_list.name: Search By Category Filters
api_list.description: Complimentary to the "Search By Category" endpoint. Obtain a list of filters available to a specified category.

required_parameters.name: categoryID
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Categories** endpoint,

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

api_list.name: Search By Category
api_list.description: Obtain a list of Ikea products information based on a specified categoryID.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Countries** endpoint,

required_parameters.name: categoryID
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Categories** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
**Format**: *parameter=value_id,parameter=value_id*
Can be obtained through the **Search By Category Filters** endpoint,

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Countries** endpoint,

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: Obtain a list of all the countries and languages this API supports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ikea-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ikea-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ikea-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ikea-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
